Description: One spacer-bead and four beads made of faience and ostrich eggshell. A: One spacer-bead made of white faience, originally consisted of five segments, now broken into two parts. Quite short and flattened in shape. B: Two fragments of cylindrical segmented beads made of white faience. C: Two disc-shaped beads made of ostrich eggshell.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
